overview:
Jun is the Co-Founder of the new life management homepage called LIFEmee. He is the lead manager that links the marketing side with the technical side.

Being a key member of LIFEmee, his roles include programming, research, marketing and overseeing the overall progress of the site. Hasegawa san is a diligent and hard working manager who came up with the idea of bringing the LIFEmee team together, about one year ago.

Jun has had 10 years experience in web and product design. He was able to utilize this valuable experience to realize his dream of creating a total life management tool for everyone to use in the world . Jun also has a lot of experience working abroad in countries such as Thailand, China, and Korea. He has also worked in a small IT company in Seattle as a web programmer. Hasegawa san brings an abundance of knowledge and experience to the LIFEmee team.
